metadata.synopsis: goblin raider attacking a druid grove full of tiefling refugees in a huge assault

0.speaker: Warrior Trunk
0.text: All these horns'll make fer good trophies... uh, no offence.
0.context: NodeContext: The horns referred to are on the heads of recently slaughtered tiefling refugees, killed in a goblin raid. He's standing among the dead, pleased with the victory - his second phrase is an embarrassed acknowledgement of the fact he's talking to a tiefling ally

1.speaker: Warrior Trunk
1.context: NodeContext: The horns referred to are on the heads of a group of tiefling refugees that the goblin is rushing into battle against. This is a war cry

2.speaker: Warrior Trunk
2.text: All these horns'll make fer good trophies.
2.context: NodeContext: The horns referred to are on the heads of recently slaughtered tiefling refugees, killed in a goblin raid. He's standing among the dead, pleased with the victory.
